website_summaries.verdict: This pressure cooker may be Cuisinart’s smallest, but if you’re short on space, want to cook smaller portions, and need to save a few bucks, this one’s for you.
pros: Simple to customize your cooking settings

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The most horrible product ever. Doesn’t even compare to the Breville. Customer service is absolutely awful. If you buy it, you’re stuck with it. I have pressure cooked stewed beef for an hour and it’s still not done. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this pressure cooker!
customer_reviews.text: What I really like about this pressure cooker is the fact that I can brown my meats first and then pressure cook them. Gravy can then be easily made when meat is done. It is “one stop shopping” for a meal. I purchased 3 thus far, including two for my two daughters. They just got theirs for their birthday and were quite excited. I am so glad that I chose Cuisinart. It is my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I believe the best brand of instant pressure cooker on the market! Works great & my family loves the recipes I fix from it!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: An elegant, simple, great electric pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Cuisinart for its elegant simplicity. It does NOT try to be the 'only' appliance you'll ever need in your kitchen; rather, it concentrates on begin what it is, a great little electric pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McClaren

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good pressure cooker. Big step up to the old one in the 80s
customer_reviews.author: joan thompson

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, quality of construction and materials.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT pressure cooker!! VERY EASY TO USE! Simple , straight foward controls. Top quality construction and materials. Have had 2 other cookers, and none compared to the Cuisinart. I like Cuisinart products and this one does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.Stone

customer_reviews.title: Speedy cooking time
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great & very timely. Makes all meals/meat moist & flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McNeal

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend this product to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.text: I have already used this product three times. It is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the type of lid which features an aluminum insert which stabilizes the silicon sealants. It's easy to pop the whole system out and cleanse it in the dishwasher. Also seems better built than most which gives me hope that it will last, and it heats fast, which is always desirable.
customer_reviews.author: thenekkidtruth

customer_reviews.title: Well built and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Cuisinart Electric Pressure cooker. The first lasted 10 years and I used it often.
customer_reviews.author: Griffens_nancy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet- (it’s a replacement)! waiting for COVID to go away so I can use it on our first big fam gathering, but I own a smaller one and I love it, I’ve used it so much the handle broke but still works.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every possible way.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this pressure cooker. It is excellent in every possible way!
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Great for browning, can't think of anything else nice to say! I am in my 70's and using pressure cookers over 50 years, both stove top and electric. This is the worst one I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!! High Quality Meals
customer_reviews.text: My life will literally never be the same. I’ve been away from home for 2 years and throwing on some recipes that taste like home are such a huge blessing to my heart. 💜💜💜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: I love this appliance. Just be careful to always check to sure the liner is in! Almost killed one when I forgot to that!
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Straus

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. This is about the only way we can cook beans above 8,000 feet in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: gardener

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to our daughter. She loves it! So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: i love this had my first one 5 years so just had to get me another one !!! GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have made beans, yucca, full meals. It is a very versatile pot and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one, and love this cooking tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Amador

customer_reviews.title: Since 2012 or 2013 I can remember I have my first one and still working liked a new one
customer_reviews.text: Is my second cuisinart pressure cooker and for me is the best of the best in time in cooking ect.....
customer_reviews.author: Family Volta’s

customer_reviews.title: Won't build up pressure
customer_reviews.text: Even brand new it did not work. The timer never began counting down. Steam could be seen escaping from underneath the handle. Tried repositioning the gasket but it didn't help. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Electric Pressure Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I like cooking with my pressure cooker as it’s fast and safe to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this pot!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this pot and she loves it. The meat and Chicken are delicious when are prepared it in this pot. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: JUANKA95

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a unit that was more than 10 years old. Thought it could not be repaired, however, the quality of the unit only required a new gasket. Gave the old one with the new gasket to our son and this one, like the one we replaced, is fantastic and a great time saver and help to our busy schedule making cooking in it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a delight to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and clean. Food cooks wonderfully. have already used 5-6 times and do not know how we got along without it.
customer_reviews.author: M Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want to burn your house down!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing caught fire so is not safe. Please do not buy it and if you have one do not leave it unattended when it's plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PAIN IN THE ASS
customer_reviews.text: OFTEN WILL NOT GO INTO PRESSURE MODE, ESPECIALLY IF YOU USED BROWNING PRIOR. NEVER BUY CUISINART, THERE STUFF IS TYPICALLY JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Avatar 1

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this pressure cooker. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough bad things about this product. It never worked right from the beginning. I had to push down on the lid to even get it to come to pressure for the 10 times I tried to use it. Even then sometimes I had to move the food to a Dutch oven and try another method because I was afraid I would kill my family using this product. I would have been better off lighting my money on fire and using that to cook my food.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Three years of use and it works like a champ. Could not be more pleased with the design and quality of this product. My wife named it R2D2.
customer_reviews.author: Rascal

customer_reviews.title: My best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This pressure cooker is one of the best pots because the buttons in the pot are confusing and its straight forward. I can start my pressure cooker in the morning before I go to work and when I'm back from work my food is ready and warm. I strongly recommend this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning issues!!
customer_reviews.text: I went through three machines within a year. Malfunctioned every time but otherwise it cooked well. Button function can be a bit annoying and confusing due to red light being so small. I definitely wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It rarely works correctly
customer_reviews.text: Disposed of by throwing it in the street and beating it with hoe. TRASH !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. I bought it again after melting the bottom of my last one on the stove (accident, not stupid!) I also have an InstaPot and I love both.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Great infused flavor
customer_reviews.text: This pressure cooker is such an improvement from the old pressure cookers of years gone by. We're able to enjoy a wonderful meal cooked in a short time and infused with so much flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Enright

customer_reviews.title: Super pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it cooks. It’s my right hand in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Brieva

customer_reviews.title: irritating at best.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure cooker is horrible. First off if you saute you can't even use the pressure cooker until its completely cooled... what's the point if I cant cook a meal in lesser time than the norm? Even sautéing in another pan doesn't help. The thing turns off right away with heated food in the pot prior to starting to pressurize. Just don't bother with this piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: It’s so inconsistent. It’s really bad about turning off before the set time and then you have to wait for it to pressure down and then restart it. I’ve done troubleshooting and can never figure out what makes it do this. Right now I have 4 chicken breasts and equal parts salsa and chicken stock in it - it’s kicked off 3 times now. There is still at least 2 C of liquid in there and nothing is sticking. I just don’t get it. Poor quality for it being Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.. COOKING POT COATING PEELED OFF INTO FOOD
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it cooks fast and easy, however I do not recommend because only after about 12 uses the coating from pot started peeling and I am afraid to cook in it now, pot not covered by warranty and replacement pot is $47 almost the price of new one. I have ordered a different brand so this one will go into trash.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for a year. It started to not seal 6 months ago. I did all the cleaning they suggested, bought 2 new seals and still will not work. Customer service is extremely hard to get. Throwing mine away and buying an instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey1

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CPC-400 4-Quart Pressure Cooker, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:4-QuartIt’s easy to make compact size meals or side dishes fast with the 4-Quart Pressure Cooker! Just toss ingredients into the pot, lock the lid, and let the pressure cooker do the work. Brown, simmer or sauté food right in the pot before cooking, and keep it warm when done! Food retains more vitamins and minerals than with traditional cooking methods, it stays moist and fl avors stay true.
feature_bullets: Push button control for cooking options and programmed settings: Low & High Pressure, Browning, Simmer, Sauté and automatic Keep Warm settings
99-minute timer and LED countdown display: 0 – 40 minutes = 1-minute increments, 40 – 99 minutes = 5-minute increments
Digital thermostat; Cool touch side handles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
